block.huajiage.huaji_antimatter_bomb.too: A powerful bomb capable of annihilating everything nearby.
block.huajiage.huaji_bomb.tooltips.1: Stronger than regular TNT, and it explodes instantly!
death.attack.huajiage.five: %1$s was crushed to pieces by §eLord.Lu§r's terrifying void power§7
death.attack.huajiage.hope_flower: %1$s ultimately could not escape the worldline convergence's absurd fate
death.attack.huajiage.orga_shot: %1$s was taken out by the Brigade Leader's (Orga's) random gunfire
death.attack.huajiage.requiem: %1$s was Muda Muda Muda'd by an invisible Stand
death.attack.huajiage.singularity: %1$s was compressed into an infinitesimal point
death.attack.huajiage.stand_hit: %1$s was sent flying across the quiet street by a barrage of critical hits
death.attack.huajiage.stella: %1$s became a shooting star in the sky
item.huajiage.50_50_helmet.tooltips.1: This helmet seals the power of Lord.Lu (a.k.a. 50-50).
item.huajiage.50_50_helmet.tooltips.shif: It is said that %1$s can partially unleash its power
%1$s can further unleash its supreme power
item.huajiage.anti_huaji.tooltips.1: Stable antimatter doesn't exist... except for HUAJI (just kidding)
item.huajiage.dio_bread.tooltips.1: §3Produced by GioGio's Bakery under the Italian conglomerate "Passione." Said to be a commemorative bread released for the 30th anniversary of the death of the group's chairman's father.§r
item.huajiage.dio_bread.tooltips.shift.1: §6This bread is largely in a state of short supply locally. However, some citizens have reported suspicions that the bread contains large amounts of additives, citing that it neither rots nor breaks even after being soaked in water for weeks, as if time had stopped. Unverified reports claim that several people exhibited extreme excitement after consuming it, saying they felt 'High to the extreme,' and even intermittently uttered meaningless phrases like 'Wryyyyyyyyy!', 'Hinjaku! Hinjaku!', or 'Muda Muda Muda.' An eyewitness claimed their neighbor fell into a frenzied state after eating the bread, spending days shouting at nothing, disturbing the public on the streets, and even smashing a roadside road roller. Local police have conducted a detailed investigation, and lab results showed no abnormalities. Regarding this, Officer Apatea (pseudonym) reminded citizens of Rome not to believe or spread rumors lightly, lest they disrupt normal social order.§r
item.huajiage.disc.tooltips.craft: If you see this item in a crafting recipe, use any Disc in its place.
item.huajiage.ether_point.tooltips.1: An Ether particle of extremely low purity, far from the level of an Infinity Stone.
item.huajiage.hero_bow.tooltips.2: Robustness EX: Arash, with a strong remnant aura from the Age of Gods, possesses innate exceptional hardiness. Having never been injured in battle or fallen ill since birth, this anomalous trait of Arash is skill-ified. Increases durability parameters and reduces damage taken. As a composite skill, it also includes resistance to poison.
item.huajiage.hero_bow.tooltips.3: Clairvoyance A: Superior eyesight. Allows targeting of distant objects and enhances dynamic vision. Arash, possessing this skill at rank A or above, is capable of limited future sight (prediction) and even mind reading.
item.huajiage.hero_bow.tooltips.4: Bow and Arrow Construction A: Having received wisdom from the goddess Armaiti, he, being both the designer and maker of the "bow," can instantly create bows and arrows if materials are available. While the bow requires physical materials, arrows can be formed from his own magical energy. Thus, Arash can intermittently fire countless arrows.
item.huajiage.hero_bow.tooltips.shift.2: (Press [%1$s]+[%2$s] to release—though it's not recommended—[manual HUAJI]
item.huajiage.hero_bow.tooltips.shift.on: WARNING: Noble Phantasm fully released! Drawing the bowstring to its full extent will cause you to be torn apart the moment the arrow is loosed!
item.huajiage.lord_core.tooltips.1: §6The supreme power of a Hacker is condensed within.§r
item.huajiage.lord_key.tooltips.1: A mysterious key passed down from ancient times, said to further unleash the terrifying supreme power of §e§lLord.Lu§7 contained within the §3§lHacker Core§r.
item.huajiage.orga.tooltips.1: Rejoice! The birth of the Martian King who gathered the Flower of Hope from all timelines—It's Orga Itsuka daze!
item.huajiage.orga_requiem.tooltips.shif: Ability I - Unstoppable Orga: §3Using the Requiem's power on himself, Orga can never reach the truth of death.§r
Ability II - Assassin Decreed by Causality: §3Any enemy who attempts to attack Orga will suffer double the damage they dealt in return.§r
Ability III - Requiem: §3Approaching the critical point of death, Orga activates the Requiem's power, continuously Muda-punching the opponent with a Stand (invisible even to Stand users).§r
item.huajiage.reo_cherry.tooltips.2: A cherry that constantly makes strange sounds
item.huajiage.singularity.tooltips.1: WARNING!!! You'd better equip your best gear to resist the effects of the Singularity! You MUST survive until the effect ends! The dead cannot reach the new world!!!
item.huajiage.tarot.tooltips.1: Can be used to store a Stand. Use to equip/unequip a Stand.
message.huajiage.50_50_helmet.active: From now on, this place shall be called %1$s Square!
message.huajiage.50_50_helmet.failed: Perhaps you haven't gathered enough Hacker power yet?
message.huajiage.50_50_helmet.lord: %1$s unleashed the supreme power of Lord.Lu, striding through the void—how terrifying!
message.huajiage.orga.awake.2: §4The path is open. All we have to do now is keep moving forward! §lRide On!§r
message.huajiage.orga.shot: §eWhat do you know, my marksmanship is pretty good after all!§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.01: §4What do you know, my marksmanship is pretty good after all... Heh.§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.03: §4Why is your voice trembling? Ride on!§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.05: §4I am... the leader of Tekkadan, Orga Itsuka, daze! This little injury is nothing.§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.12: §4Our destination doesn't matter at all. We just need to keep moving forward.§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.13: §4As long as we don't stop, the path will... continue to extend!§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.15: §9I won't forgive you if you apologize.§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.17: (BGM: ki bo no ha na~ (Flower of Hope))
message.huajiage.orga.sing.19: §4As long as you don't stop, I'll definitely be there ahead!!!§r
message.huajiage.orga.sing.22: §4Dakara yo, §ldon't stop...§r (So hear me well, §ldon't you ever stop...)
message.huajiage.patchouli_missing: [{"text":"[HUAJI Age: Astral Regenesis]:","color":"yellow","bold":true},{"text":" For the best experience, please install  ","color":"aqua","bold":false},{"text":"Patchouli","color":"green","underlined":true,"bold":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/patchouli"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":"https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/patchouli"}},{"text":"§b to get the guidebook. This is the §e§lJO§6§l-level Tome§b, the lifelong cultivation passed down by the Kichiku Senpais to counter the §0§l♂Dark&&King§b force.","color":"yellow","bold":false}]
message.huajiage.singularity: The ultimate Singularity, can you reach the new world?
message.huajiage.stand.fail: The Stand backfired on you—it seems you're unlucky
message.huajiage.stand.skill_failed: Your mental power is insufficient to summon a Stand...
message.huajiage.stand.trigger_failed: Your mental power is insufficient to activate Stand skills...
message.huajiage.stella_warning: WARNING: True Name Release state may cause irreversible consequences. Do NOT easily draw the bowstring to its full extent in this state!!!
message.huajiage.tarot.stand.failed: You already have a Stand. If you wish to change it, please find an empty Tarot card to unequip first.
patchouli.huajiage.book.landing: In this universe, there exists a peculiar thing named HUAJI. It is ubiquitous and constitutes myriad things. It is said that by wielding the starlight power of HUAJI, one can obtain the supreme power of the legendary Kichiku Senpais.
patchouli.huajiage.book.name: §e§lJO§6-level Tome§r
stand.huajiage.name: Stand Name: %1$s
stand.huajiage.orga_requiem.skill: §4§lDon't Stop!!! The Truth of the Infinite Loop Street!§r
subtitles.huajiage.dio_flag: DIO: Too slow! You can't escape!
subtitles.huajiage.exglutenbur_flavor3: EX Glutenbur: Let you taste real lime!
subtitles.huajiage.orga_requiem_1: Buchou, what are you doing, Buchou!?
subtitles.huajiage.orga_requiem_hit: Unstoppable Orga Requiem: Muda Muda Muda!
